channel.title: Library Table Talk
channel.description:
Library Table Talk is a podcast exploring what academic librarianship looks like in the day-to-day across different types of institutions and roles. We invite other librarians for firendly and more informal conversations about the practicalities, responsibilities, challenges, joys and realities of academic librarianship, as a job and a career.

Nothing is off the table!

For more information, visit the Library Table Talk website at z.umn.edu/LibraryTableTalk

For more information, please refer to the Library Table Talk website at z.umn.edu/LibraryTableTalk
